name: Chaos - The Zap Bot
description:
What if your messaging app suddenly gets a little out of control and decides to erase everything? Even the emojis?

In this game, you have to survive as long as possible being an emoji in the chaos of a bad messenger bot.

How to Play:

Use the left and right arrows to move the emoji and avoid the enemies and the barriers.

The space bar will reset the level and skip the story screens.

Remember: Survive as long as you can and have fun.

Game trailer: Credits:

Emojis = Emojipedia

Music and Sounds = Grovepad app & Beat Snap app

Special thanks to the Jamtastic group.

--

This project was made on the theme "Chaos" for the game jam 1JAM on july/2020
